trans-unit.source: An abstract base class that provides functionality for the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> and <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> descended classes.
trans-unit.target: 为源自 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 的类提供功能的抽象基类。

trans-unit.source: To draw an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> on a Windows Form, you should use one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要绘制<xref:System.Drawing.Image>在 Windows 窗体，应使用一种<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例用于 Windows 窗体。

trans-unit.source: It is a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: 它是处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object is passed to the event and is used to draw the image on the form.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>对象传递给事件和用于窗体上绘制图像。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a file named SampImag.jpg.
trans-unit.target: 从名为 sampimag.jpg 位于同一个文件中创建的映像。

trans-unit.source: This file must be located in the same folder as the application executable file.
trans-unit.target: 此文件必须位于应用程序可执行文件所在的文件夹。

trans-unit.source: Creates a point at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image.
trans-unit.target: 创建在其中绘制图像的左上角的点。

trans-unit.source: Draws the unscaled image on the form.
trans-unit.target: 窗体上绘制无比例的图像。

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的一个精确副本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> this method creates, cast as an object.
trans-unit.target: 该方法创建的、强制转换为对象的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.
trans-unit.target: 每次释放对 <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Dispose%2A> 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 <xref:System.Drawing.Image>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 <xref:System.Drawing.Image> 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Dispose%2A> method allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.Image> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Drawing.Image.Dispose%2A>方法允许使用的资源<xref:System.Drawing.Image>可以重新分配用于其他目的。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.
trans-unit.target: 在完成使用 <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Dispose%2A> 后，应调用 <xref:System.Drawing.Image>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Dispose%2A> 方法使 <xref:System.Drawing.Image> 处于不可用状态。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在调用<xref:System.Drawing.Image.Dispose%2A>，必须释放对所有引用<xref:System.Drawing.Image>以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，<xref:System.Drawing.Image>占用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.
trans-unit.target: 每次释放对 <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Dispose%2A> 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 <xref:System.Drawing.Image>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 <xref:System.Drawing.Image> 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.
trans-unit.target: 每次释放对 <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Dispose%2A> 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 <xref:System.Drawing.Image>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 <xref:System.Drawing.Image> 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在垃圾回收将某一对象回收前允许该对象尝试释放资源并执行其他清理操作。

trans-unit.source: Gets attribute flags for the pixel data of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取该 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的像素数据的特性标志。

trans-unit.source: The integer representing a bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFlags" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示该 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFlags" /> 按位组合的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的整数。

trans-unit.source: The integer value returned from this method will correspond to a sum of <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFlags>, as described in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的整数值将对应于的总和<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFlags>下, 表中所述。

trans-unit.source: ImageFlag value
trans-unit.target: ImageFlag 值

trans-unit.source: Integer representation
trans-unit.target: 整数表示形式

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Flags%2A> property for an image returned 77960, the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFlags> for the image would be <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFlags.ReadOnly>, <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFlags.HasRealDpi>, <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFlags.HasRealPixelSize>, <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFlags.ColorSpaceYcbcr>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFlags.PartiallyScalable>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Drawing.Image.Flags%2A>映像的属性返回 77960，<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFlags>图像很<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFlags.ReadOnly>， <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFlags.HasRealDpi>， <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFlags.HasRealPixelSize>， <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFlags.ColorSpaceYcbcr>，和<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFlags.PartiallyScalable>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of GUIDs that represent the dimensions of frames within this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 GUID 的数组，这些 GUID 表示此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 中帧的维数。

trans-unit.source: An array of GUIDs that specify the dimensions of frames within this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> from most significant to least significant.
trans-unit.target: GUID 的数组，这些 GUID 指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 中从最重要到最不重要的帧的维数。

trans-unit.source: This method returns information about multiple-frame images, which come in two styles: multiple page and multiple resolution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回采取两种样式的多帧图像的相关信息： 多个页面和多个解决方法。

trans-unit.source: A multiple-page image is an image that contains more than one image.
trans-unit.target: 多页映像是包含多个映像的映像。

trans-unit.source: Each page contains a single image (or frame).
trans-unit.target: 每页包含单个映像 （或段）。

trans-unit.source: These pages (or images, or frames) are typically displayed in succession to produce an animated sequence, such as an animated .gif file.
trans-unit.target: 连续生成动画的序列，如动态的.gif 文件通常显示这些页 （或映像或帧）。

trans-unit.source: A multiple-resolution image is an image that contains more than one copy of an image at different resolutions.
trans-unit.target: 多个高分辨率图像是映像的包含多个副本在不同的解决方法的映像。

trans-unit.source: This is commonly used by MIP mapping where the displayed image size determines the resolution of the image used for drawing.
trans-unit.target: 这是通常由使用 MIP 映射其中显示的图像大小将确定用于绘制图像的分辨率。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] can support an arbitrary number of pages (or images, or frames), as well as an arbitrary number of resolutions.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 可以支持任意数目的页 （或映像，或者帧），以及任意数量的解决方法。

trans-unit.source: The defined dimensions are properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.FrameDimension>.
trans-unit.target: 定义的维度为属性<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.FrameDimension>。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> from the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的文件创建 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the file from which to create the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 字符串，包含要从中创建 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> from the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的文件创建 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> this method creates.
trans-unit.target: 此方法创建的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: Managed GDI+ has built-in encoders and decoders that support the following file types:
trans-unit.target: 托管 GDI + 具有内置编码器和解码器支持以下文件类型：

trans-unit.source: BMP
trans-unit.target: BMP

trans-unit.source: GIF
trans-unit.target: GIF

trans-unit.source: JPEG
trans-unit.target: JPEG

trans-unit.source: PNG
trans-unit.target: PNG

trans-unit.source: TIFF
trans-unit.target: TIFF

trans-unit.source: The file remains locked until the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> is disposed.
trans-unit.target: 该文件将保持锁定状态，直到<xref:System.Drawing.Image>已释放。

trans-unit.source: If the file does not have a valid image format or if [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] does not support the pixel format of the file, this method throws an <xref:System.OutOfMemoryException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果该文件没有有效的图像格式或如果[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]不支持像素格式的文件，此方法将引发<xref:System.OutOfMemoryException>异常。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Image> class does not support alpha transparency in bitmaps.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Image>类在位图中不支持 alpha 透明度。

trans-unit.source: To enable alpha transparency, use PNG images with 32 bits per pixel.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用 alpha 透明度，且每个像素的 32 位使用 PNG 图像。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.FromFile%2A><xref:System.Drawing.Image.GetPropertyItem%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Image.SetPropertyItem%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Drawing.Image.FromFile%2A><xref:System.Drawing.Image.GetPropertyItem%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Image.SetPropertyItem%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a form, and handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event by calling the `DemonstratePropertyItem` method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例中，将其粘贴到窗体，并处理该窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>通过调用的事件`DemonstratePropertyItem`方法，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.target: 使用该文件中的嵌入颜色管理信息，从指定的文件创建 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> this method creates.
trans-unit.target: 此方法创建的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: Managed GDI+ has built-in encoders and decoders that support the following file types:
trans-unit.target: 托管 GDI + 具有内置编码器和解码器支持以下文件类型：

trans-unit.source: BMP
trans-unit.target: BMP

trans-unit.source: GIF
trans-unit.target: GIF

trans-unit.source: JPEG
trans-unit.target: JPEG

trans-unit.source: PNG
trans-unit.target: PNG

trans-unit.source: TIFF
trans-unit.target: TIFF

trans-unit.source: If the file does not have a valid image format or if [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] does not support the pixel format of the file, this method throws an <xref:System.OutOfMemoryException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果该文件没有有效的图像格式或如果[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]不支持像素格式的文件，此方法将引发<xref:System.OutOfMemoryException>异常。

trans-unit.source: The file remains locked until the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> is disposed.
trans-unit.target: 该文件将保持锁定状态，直到<xref:System.Drawing.Image>已释放。

trans-unit.source: The `useEmbeddedColorManagement` parameter specifies whether the new <xref:System.Drawing.Image> applies color correction according to color management information that is embedded in the image file.
trans-unit.target: `useEmbeddedColorManagement`参数指定是否新<xref:System.Drawing.Image>应用颜色校正根据嵌入图像文件中的颜色管理信息。

trans-unit.source: Embedded information can include International Color Consortium (ICC) profiles, gamma values, and chromaticity information.
trans-unit.target: 国际色彩联合会 (ICC) 配置文件、 伽玛值和色度信息可以包括嵌入的信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Image> class does not support alpha transparency in bitmaps.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Image>类在位图中不支持 alpha 透明度。

trans-unit.source: To enable alpha transparency, use PNG images with 32 bits per pixel.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用 alpha 透明度，且每个像素的 32 位使用 PNG 图像。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to load a bitmap from an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> handle, using the <xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit> enumeration, and how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Round%2A> method to draw the rectangle bounds of a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何加载从位图<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>处理，使用<xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit>枚举，以及如何使用<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Round%2A>方法，以便绘制的矩形边界的位图。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Create a form that contains a button named `Button2`.
trans-unit.target: 创建包含名为的按钮的窗体`Button2`。

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into the form and associate this method with the button's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 将代码粘贴到窗体并将此方法与按钮的关联<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: A GUID that specifies the image encoder.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定图像编码器的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the parameters supported by the specified image encoder.
trans-unit.target: 返回有关指定的图像编码器所支持的参数的信息。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderParameters" /> that contains an array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderParameter" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderParameters" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderParameter" /> 对象的一个数组。

trans-unit.source: Each <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderParameter" /> contains information about one of the parameters supported by the specified image encoder.
trans-unit.target: 每个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderParameter" /> 都包含有关指定的图像编码器所支持的某个参数的信息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.FrameDimension" /> that specifies the identity of the dimension type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.FrameDimension" />，它指定维度类型的标识。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of frames of the specified dimension.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定维度的帧数。

trans-unit.source: The number of frames in the specified dimension.
trans-unit.target: 指定维度中的帧数。

trans-unit.source: This method returns information about multiple-frame images, which come in two styles: multiple page and multiple resolution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回采取两种样式的多帧图像的相关信息： 多个页面和多个解决方法。

trans-unit.source: A multiple-page image is an image that contains more than one image.
trans-unit.target: 多页映像是包含多个映像的映像。

trans-unit.source: Each page contains a single image (or frame).
trans-unit.target: 每页包含单个映像 （或段）。

trans-unit.source: These pages (or images, or frames) are typically displayed in succession to produce an animated sequence, such as an animated .gif file.
trans-unit.target: 连续生成动画的序列，如动态的.gif 文件通常显示这些页 （或映像或帧）。

trans-unit.source: A multiple-resolution image is an image that contains more than one copy of an image at different resolutions.
trans-unit.target: 多个高分辨率图像是映像的包含多个副本在不同的解决方法的映像。

trans-unit.source: This is commonly used by MIP mapping where the displayed image size determines the resolution of the image used for drawing.
trans-unit.target: 这是通常由使用 MIP 映射其中显示的图像大小将确定用于绘制图像的分辨率。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] can support an arbitrary number of pages (or images, or frames), as well as an arbitrary number of resolutions.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 可以支持任意数目的页 （或映像，或者帧），以及任意数量的解决方法。

trans-unit.source: The defined dimensions are properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.FrameDimension>.
trans-unit.target: 定义的维度为属性<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.FrameDimension>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat" /> member that specifies the format for which to find the size.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat" /> 的成员，指定要查找其大小的格式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the color depth, in number of bits per pixel, of the specified pixel format.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定像素格式的颜色深度（每个像素的位数）。

trans-unit.source: The color depth of the specified pixel format.
trans-unit.target: 指定的像素格式的颜色深度。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the property item to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的属性项的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified property item from this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 从该 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 获取指定的属性项。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem" /> this method gets.
trans-unit.target: 此方法获取的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem" />。

trans-unit.source: For a list of property item IDs and links to more information, see <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Id%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 属性项 Id 和的详细信息的链接列表，请参阅<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Id%2A>。

trans-unit.source: It is difficult to set property items, because the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem> class has no public constructors.
trans-unit.target: 因为很难设置属性项<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem>类具有没有公共构造函数。

trans-unit.source: One way to work around this restriction is to obtain a <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem> by retrieving the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.PropertyItems%2A> property value or calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.GetPropertyItem%2A> method of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> that already has property items.
trans-unit.target: 若要解决此限制的一种方法是获取<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem>通过检索<xref:System.Drawing.Image.PropertyItems%2A>属性值或调用<xref:System.Drawing.Image.GetPropertyItem%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Image>已具有属性项。

trans-unit.source: Then you can set the fields of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem> and pass it to <xref:System.Drawing.Image.SetPropertyItem%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 然后，可以将设置的字段<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem>和将其传递到<xref:System.Drawing.Image.SetPropertyItem%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.GetPropertyItem%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Image.SetPropertyItem%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Drawing.Image.GetPropertyItem%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Image.SetPropertyItem%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example calls <xref:System.Drawing.Image.GetPropertyItem%2A> passing an ID value.
trans-unit.target: 此示例调用<xref:System.Drawing.Image.GetPropertyItem%2A>传递 ID 值。

trans-unit.source: For a list of ID values see, <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Id%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 为 ID 的列表值，请参阅<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Id%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a form, and handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event by calling the `DemonstratePropertyItem` method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例中，将其粘贴到窗体，并处理该窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>通过调用的事件`DemonstratePropertyItem`方法，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: The image format of this image does not support property items.
trans-unit.target: 此图像的图像格式不支持属性项。

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the requested thumbnail image.
trans-unit.target: 请求的缩略图的宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the requested thumbnail image.
trans-unit.target: 请求的缩略图的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image.GetThumbnailImageAbort" /> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image.GetThumbnailImageAbort" /> 委托。

trans-unit.source: **Note** You must create a delegate and pass a reference to the delegate as the <c>callback</c> parameter, but the delegate is not used.
trans-unit.target: 注意 必须创建一个委托并将对此委托的引用作为 <c>callback</c> 参数传递，但不使用此委托。

trans-unit.source: Must be <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />.
trans-unit.target: 必须为 <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a thumbnail for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的缩略图。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> that represents the thumbnail.
trans-unit.target: 表示缩略图的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> contains an embedded thumbnail image, this method retrieves the embedded thumbnail and scales it to the requested size.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Drawing.Image>包含嵌入的缩略图图像，此方法检索嵌入式缩略图，可以扩展到所请求的大小。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> does not contain an embedded thumbnail image, this method creates a thumbnail image by scaling the main image.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Drawing.Image>不包含嵌入的缩略图图像，此方法通过缩放主映像来创建缩略图。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Image.GetThumbnailImage%2A> method works well when the requested thumbnail image has a size of about 120 x 120 pixels.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Image.GetThumbnailImage%2A>方法也适用的请求的缩略图时具有 120 x 120 像素为单位的大小。

trans-unit.source: If you request a large thumbnail image (for example, 300 x 300) from an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> that has an embedded thumbnail, there could be a noticeable loss of quality in the thumbnail image.
trans-unit.target: 如果从请求的大缩略图图像 (例如，300 x 300)<xref:System.Drawing.Image>具有嵌入式缩略图，可能有明显丢失的质量中的缩略图。

trans-unit.source: It might be better to scale the main image (instead of scaling the embedded thumbnail) by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它可能是更好的做法 （而不是缩放嵌入式缩略图） 将主要图像缩放通过调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates and displays a thumbnail image.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建并显示缩略图。

trans-unit.source: This property returns a copy of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorPalette> object used by this <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回由此 <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorPalette> 使用的 <xref:System.Drawing.Image> 对象的副本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the width and height of this image.
trans-unit.target: 获取此图像的宽度和高度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure that represents the width and height of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> 结构，表示此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的宽度和高度。

trans-unit.source: If the image is a bitmap, the width and height are returned in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 如果图像是一个位图，以像素为单位返回的宽度和高度。

trans-unit.source: If the image is a metafile, the width and height are returned in 0.01 millimeter units.
trans-unit.target: 如果图像，图元文件的宽度和高度返回以 0.01 毫米为单位。

trans-unit.source: Gets the pixel format for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的像素格式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat" /> that represents the pixel format for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat" />，表示此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的像素格式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to construct a new bitmap from a file, using the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.GetPixel%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.SetPixel%2A> methods to recolor the image.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何构造从文件、 新的位图使用<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.GetPixel%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.SetPixel%2A>方法为图像重新着色。

trans-unit.source: It also uses the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.PixelFormat%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 它还使用<xref:System.Drawing.Image.PixelFormat%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `Label1`, `PictureBox1`, and `Button1`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 此示例设计用于包含一个 Windows 窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>名为`Label1`， `PictureBox1`，和`Button1`分别。

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into the form and associate the `Button1_Click` method with the button's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 将代码粘贴到窗体并将关联`Button1_Click`方法与该按钮<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets IDs of the property items stored in this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取存储于该 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 中的属性项的 ID。

trans-unit.source: An array of the property IDs, one for each property item stored in this image.
trans-unit.target: 由属性 ID 组成的一个数组，此图像中存储的每个属性项各有一个 ID。

trans-unit.source: If the image has no property items or if the image format does not support property items, the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.PropertyIdList%2A> property returns an empty array (that is, an array of length zero).
trans-unit.target: 如果该图像没有属性项或图像格式不支持属性项<xref:System.Drawing.Image.PropertyIdList%2A>属性返回一个空数组 （即，长度为零的数组）。

trans-unit.source: Gets all the property items (pieces of metadata) stored in this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取存储于该 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 中的所有属性项（元数据片）。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem" /> objects, one for each property item stored in the image.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem" /> 对象组成的一个数组，这些对象分别对应于此图像中存储的每个属性项。

trans-unit.source: If the image has no property items or if the image format does not support property items, <xref:System.Drawing.Image.PropertyItems%2A> returns an empty array (that is, an array of length zero).
trans-unit.target: 如果该图像没有属性项或图像格式不支持属性项<xref:System.Drawing.Image.PropertyItems%2A>返回一个空数组 （即，长度为零的数组）。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to read and display the metadata in an image file using the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> class and the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.PropertyItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何读取和显示在图像文件中使用的元数据<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem?displayProperty=nameWithType>类和<xref:System.Drawing.Image.PropertyItems%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used a Windows Form that imports the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 此示例旨在作为使用 Windows 窗体可导入<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging?displayProperty=nameWithType>命名空间。

trans-unit.target: 将代码粘贴到窗体和更改的路径`fakePhoto.jpg`使其指向你的系统上图像文件。

trans-unit.source: Call the `ExtractMetaData` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 调用`ExtractMetaData`方法时处理该窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the file format of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的文件格式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> that represents the file format of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" />，表示此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的文件格式。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the property item to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的属性项的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified property item from this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 从该 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 移除指定的属性项。

trans-unit.source: It is difficult to set property items, because the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem> class has no public constructors.
trans-unit.target: 因为很难设置属性项<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem>类具有没有公共构造函数。

trans-unit.source: One way to work around this restriction is to obtain a <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem> by retrieving the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.PropertyItems%2A> property value or calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.GetPropertyItem%2A> method of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> that already has property items.
trans-unit.target: 若要解决此限制的一种方法是获取<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem>通过检索<xref:System.Drawing.Image.PropertyItems%2A>属性值或调用<xref:System.Drawing.Image.GetPropertyItem%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Image>已具有属性项。

trans-unit.source: Then you can set the fields of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem> and pass it to <xref:System.Drawing.Image.SetPropertyItem%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 然后，可以将设置的字段<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem>和将其传递到<xref:System.Drawing.Image.SetPropertyItem%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The image does not contain the requested property item.
trans-unit.target: 该图像不包含请求的属性项。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RotateFlipType" /> member that specifies the type of rotation and flip to apply to the image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RotateFlipType" /> 成员，指定要应用于该图像的旋转和翻转的类型。

trans-unit.source: Rotates, flips, or rotates and flips the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 旋转、翻转或者同时旋转和翻转 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Image.RotateFlip%2A> method rotates the image clockwise.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Image.RotateFlip%2A>方法将轮换顺时针旋转的映像。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to draw on an image once it has been rotated, you should always retrieve a new graphics object from the image, otherwise an exception could occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要在图像上绘制，已旋转后，你应始终检索新的图形对象从映像，否则，将出现异常。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何调用<xref:System.Drawing.Image.RotateFlip%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Image>和<xref:System.Drawing.RotateFlipType>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Ensure the file path to the bitmap is valid on your system.
trans-unit.target: 确保你系统上有效的位图的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: Saves this image to the specified stream in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 将此图像以指定的格式保存到指定的流中。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the file to which to save this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 字符串，包含要将此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 保存到的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Saves this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to the specified file or stream.
trans-unit.target: 将该 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 保存到指定的文件或流。

trans-unit.source: If no encoder exists for the file format of the image, the Portable Network Graphics (PNG) encoder is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果编码器不存在的映像的文件格式，则使用可移植网络图形 (PNG) 编码器。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A> method to save a graphic image as a Windows Metafile Format (WMF) or Enhanced Metafile Format (EMF) file, the resulting file is saved as a Portable Network Graphics (PNG) file.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A>方法将一幅图像保存为 Windows 图元文件格式 (WMF) 或增强型图元文件格式 (EMF) 文件中，生成的文件保存为可移植网络图形 (PNG) 文件。

trans-unit.source: This behavior occurs because the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] component of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] does not have an encoder that you can use to save files as .wmf or .emf files.
trans-unit.target: 出现此行为是因为[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]组件的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]没有可用于将文件另存为.wmf 或.emf 文件的编码器。

trans-unit.source: Saving the image to the same file it was constructed from is not allowed and throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 将图像保存到同一个文件从构造不允许，并引发异常。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.FrameDimension" /> that specifies the identity of the dimension type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.FrameDimension" />，它指定维度类型的标识。

trans-unit.source: The index of the active frame.
trans-unit.target: 活动帧的索引。

trans-unit.source: Selects the frame specified by the dimension and index.
trans-unit.target: 选择由维度和索引指定的帧。

trans-unit.source: Always returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回 0。

trans-unit.source: The possible values of the `dimensionID` parameter are properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.FrameDimension>.
trans-unit.target: 可能值`dimensionID`参数是属性的<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.FrameDimension>。

trans-unit.source: These can be used to identify an image by its time, resolution, or page number.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用这些来按其时间、 解决方法或页号标识图像。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method causes all changes made to the previous frame to be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法会导致要放弃对上一个帧所做的所有更改。

trans-unit.source: Before selecting another frame, save all changes made to the current frame, including changes to pixel values and properties.
trans-unit.target: 选择另一个帧之前, 保存到当前的框架，包括对像素值和属性的更改所做的所有更改。

trans-unit.source: If the call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.SelectActiveFrame%2A> method is successful (an exception does not occur), the method will return 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Drawing.Image.SelectActiveFrame%2A>方法就是成功 （没有发生的异常），该方法将返回 0。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem" /> to be stored.
trans-unit.target: 要存储的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Stores a property item (piece of metadata) in this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 在此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 中存储一个属性项（元数据片）。

trans-unit.source: If the image format does not support property items, this method throws <xref:System.ArgumentException> with the message "Property not supported."
trans-unit.target: 如果图像格式不支持属性项，此方法将引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>并显示消息"不支持此属性。"

trans-unit.source: If the image format supports property items but does not support the particular property you are attempting to set, this method ignores the attempt but does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果图像格式支持属性项，但不支持您尝试设置的特定属性，此方法将忽略此尝试，但不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: It is difficult to set property items, because the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem> class has no public constructors.
trans-unit.target: 因为很难设置属性项<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem>类具有没有公共构造函数。

trans-unit.source: One way to work around this restriction is to obtain a <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem> by retrieving the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.PropertyItems%2A> property value or calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.GetPropertyItem%2A> method of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> that already has property items.
trans-unit.target: 若要解决此限制的一种方法是获取<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem>通过检索<xref:System.Drawing.Image.PropertyItems%2A>属性值或调用<xref:System.Drawing.Image.GetPropertyItem%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Image>已具有属性项。

trans-unit.source: Then you can set the fields of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem> and pass it to <xref:System.Drawing.Image.SetPropertyItem%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 然后，可以将设置的字段<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem>和将其传递到<xref:System.Drawing.Image.SetPropertyItem%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.GetPropertyItem%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Image.SetPropertyItem%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Drawing.Image.GetPropertyItem%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Image.SetPropertyItem%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a form, and handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event by calling the `DemonstratePropertyItem` method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例中，将其粘贴到窗体，并处理该窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>通过调用的事件`DemonstratePropertyItem`方法，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: The image format of this image does not support property items.
trans-unit.target: 此图像的图像格式不支持属性项。

trans-unit.source: Gets the width and height, in pixels, of this image.
trans-unit.target: 获取此图像的宽度和高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure that represents the width and height, in pixels, of this image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 结构，表示此图像的宽度和高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: 要填充数据的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The destination (see <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />) for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: 此序列化的目标（请参见 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />）。

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: 使用将目标对象序列化所需的数据填充 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that provides additional data about the image.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置提供有关图像的附加数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that provides additional data about the image.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关图像附加数据的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical resolution, in pixels per inch, of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的垂直分辨率（以“像素/英寸”为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The vertical resolution, in pixels per inch, of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的垂直分辨率（以“像素/英寸”为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Gets the width, in pixels, of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to construct a new <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> from a file, using the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.GetPixel%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.SetPixel%2A> methods to recolor the image.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何构造新<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>从文件、 使用<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.GetPixel%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.SetPixel%2A>方法为图像重新着色。

trans-unit.source: It also uses the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.PixelFormat%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Width%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Height%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 它还使用<xref:System.Drawing.Image.PixelFormat%2A>， <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Width%2A>，和<xref:System.Drawing.Image.Height%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with a Windows Forms that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> ,<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `Label1`, `PictureBox1` and `Button1`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 此示例设计用于包含 Windows 窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>名为`Label1`，`PictureBox1`和`Button1`分别。

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into the form and associate the `Button1_Click` method with the button's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 将代码粘贴到窗体并将关联`Button1_Click`方法与该按钮<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件。
